description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to ground floor flat with associated alterations to existing fenestration
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be commenced within 3 years from the date of this decision. Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act, 1990. (As amended)

Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Conditions 4 (Window and door reveals, overhangs and rainwater goods), Condition 7 (Construction Management Plan), Condition 9 (Water efficiency standard), Condition 10 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy and Surface water drainage) and Condition 12 (refuse and recycling facilities) of planning permission 19/03120/FUL are hereby fully approved.
